Verses: 1 yesu Ivaigalai Sonnapinbu, Thammudaiya Seesharudanekooda Kedharon Ennum Aatrukku Appuram Ponaar; Ange Oru Thottam Irundhadhu, Adhile Avarum Avarudaiya Seesharum Pravesiththaargal.
2 yesu Thammudaiya Seesharudanekooda Adikkadi Ange Poyirundhapadiyinaal, Avaraik Kaattikkodukkira Yoodhaasum Andha Idaththai Arindhirundhaan.

3 yoodhaas Porchchevagarin Koottaththaiyum Pradhaana Aasaariyar Pariseyar Enbavargalaal Anuppappatta Oozhiyakkaararaiyum Koottikkondu, Pandhangalodum Theevattigalodum Aayudhangalodum Avvidaththirku Vandhaan.
4 yesu Thamakku Neridappogira Ellaavatraiyum Arindhu, Edhirkondupoi, Avargalai Nokki: Yaaraith Thedugireergal Endraar.
5 avarukku Avargal Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaith Thedugirom Endraargal. Adharku Yesu: Naandhaan Endraar. Avaraik Kaattikkoduththa Yoodhaasum Avargaludane Kooda Nindraan.
6 naandhaan Endru Avar Avargalidaththil Sonnavudane, Avargal Pinnittuth Tharaiyile Vizhundhaargal.
7 avar Marupadiyum Avargalai Nokki: Yaaraith Thedugireergal Endru Kettaar. Avargal: Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaith Thedugirom Endraargal.
8 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naandhaanendru Ungalukku Sonnene; Ennaith Thedugiradhundaanaal, Ivargalaip Pogavidungal Endraar.
9 neer Enakkuth Thandhavargalil Oruvanaiyum Naan Izhandhupogavillaiyendru Avar Solliya Vasanam Niraiveraththakkadhaaga Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
10 appozhudhu Seemonpedhuru, Thannidaththilirundha Pattayaththai Uruvi, Pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaaranai Valadhukaadhara Vettinaan; Andha Velaikkaaranukku Malkus Endru Peyar.
11 appozhudhu Yesu Pedhuruvai Nokki: Un Pattayaththai Uraiyilepodu; Pidhaa Enakkuk Koduththa Paaththiraththil Naan Paanampannaadhiruppeno Endraar.
12 appozhudhu Porchchevagarum, Aayiram Porchchevagarukkuth Thalaivanum, Yoodharudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Yesuvaippidiththu, Avaraik Katti,
13 mudhalaavadhu Avarai Annaa Enbavanidaththirkuk Konduponaargal; Avan Andha Varushaththup Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Kaaipaavukku Maamanaayirundhaan.
14 janangalukkaaga Ore Manushan Saagiradhu Nalamaayirukkumendru Yoodharukku Aalosanai Sonnavan Indhak Kaaipaave.

15 seemonpedhuruvum Veroruseeshanum Yesuvukkup Pinsendraargal. Andha Seeshan Pradhaana Aasaariyanukku Arimugamaanavanaayirundhadhinaal, Yesuvudanekoodap Pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Aramanaikkul Pravesiththaan.

16 pedhuru Vaasalaruge Veliye Nindraan. Appozhudhu Pradhaana Aasaariyanukku Arimugamaanavanaayirundha Matra Seeshan Veliye Vandhu, Vaasal Kaakkiravargaludane Pesi Pedhuruvai Ulle Azhaiththukkonduponaan.
17 appozhudhu Vaasalkaakkira Velaikkaari Pedhuruvai Nokki: Neeyum Andha Manushanudaiya Seesharil Oruvanallavaa Endraal. Avan Naan Alla Endraan.
18 kulirkaalamaanapadiyinaale Oozhiyakkaararum Sevagarum Karineruppundaakki, Nindru, Kulirkaaindhu Kondirundhaargal; Avargaludane Koodap Pedhuruvum Nindru Kulirkaaindhukondirundhaan.
19 pradhaana Aasaariyan Yesuvinidaththil Avarudaiya Seesharaikkuriththum Podhagaththaikkuriththum Visaariththaan.

20 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Veliyarangamaai Ulagaththudane Pesinen; Jebaaalayangalileyum Yoodhargalellaarum Kootivarugira Dhevaalayaththileyum Eppozhudhum Ubadhesiththen; Andharangaththile Naan Ondrum Pesavillai.
21 neer Ennidaththil Visaarikkavendiyadhenna? Naan Sonnavaigalaik Kettavargalidaththil Visaariyum; Naan Pesinavaigalai Avargal Arindhirukkiraargale Endraar.
22 ippadi Avar Sonnapozhudhu, Sameebaththil Nindra Sevagaril Oruvan: Pradhaana Aasaariyanukku Ippadiyaa Uththaravu Sollugiradhu Endru, Yesuvai Oru Arai Araindhaan.
23 yesu Avanai Nokki: Naan Thagaadhavidhamaaip Pesinadhundaanaal, Thagaadhadhai Oppuvi; Naan Thakudhiyaaip Pesineneyaagil, Ennai En Adikkiraai Endraar.
24 pinbu Annaa Enbavan Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Kaaipaavinidaththirku Avaraik Kattundavaraaga Anuppinaan.
25 seemon Pedhuru Nindru Kulirkaaindhukondirundhaan. Appozhudhu Silar Avanai Nokki: Neeyum Avanudaiya Seesharil Oruvanallavaa Endraargal. Avan: Naan Alla Endru Marudhaliththaan.
26 pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaararil Pedhuru Kaadharavettinavanukku Inaththaanaagiya Oruvan Avanai Nokki: Naan Unnai Avanudanekoodath Thottaththile Kaanavillaiyaa Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Pedhuru Marupadiyum Marudhaliththaan; Udane Seval Koovitru.

28 avargal Kaaipaavinidaththilirundhu Yesuvaith Dhesaadhipadhiyin Aramanaikkuk Konduponaargal; Appozhudhu Vidiyarkaalamaayirundhadhu. Theettuppadaamal Paskaavaip Pusikkaththakkadhaaga, Avargal Dhesaadhipadhiyin Aramanaikkul Pravesiyaadhirundhaargal.
29 aadhalaal Pilaaththu Avargalidaththil Veliye Vandhu: Indha Manushanmel Enna Kutranchaattugireergal Endraan.
30 avargal Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ivan Kutravaaliyaayiraavittaal, Ivanai Ummidaththil Oppukkodukkamaattom Endraargal.

31 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Avargalai Nokki: Ivanai Neengale Kondupoi, Ungal Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi Nyaayantheerungal Endraan. Adharku Yoodhargal: Oruvanaiyum Marana Aakkinai Seyya Engalukku Adhigaaramillai Endraargal.
32 thaam Innavidhamaana Maranamaai Marikkappogiraarenbadhaikkuriththu Yesu Kurippaai Solliyirundha Vaarththai Niraiveraththakkadhaaga Ippadi Sonnaargal.
33 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Marupadiyum Aramanaikkul Pravesiththu, Yesuvai Azhaiththu: Nee Yoodharudaiya Raajaavaa Endru Kettaan.
34 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Neeraai Ippadi Sollugireero Alladhu Matravargal Ennaikkuriththu Ippadi Umakku Sonnaargalo Endraar.
35 pilaaththu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Yoodhanaa? Un Janangalum Pradhaana Aasaariyarum Unnai Ennidaththil Oppukkoduththaargal, Nee Enna Seydhaai Endraan.

36 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Raajyam Ivvulagaththirkuriyadhalla, En Raajyam Ivvulagaththirkuriyadhaanaal Naan Yoodharidaththil Oppukkodukkappadaadhapadikku En Oozhiyakkaarar Poraadiyiruppaargale; Ippadiyirukka En Raajyam Ivvidaththirkuriyadhalla Endraar.

37 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Avarai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal Nee Raajaavo Endraan. Yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Sollugirapadi Naan Raajaadhaan; Saththiyaththaikkuriththu Saatchikodukka Naan Pirandhen, Idharkaagave Indha Ulagaththil Vandhen; Saththiyavaan Evanum En Saththam Ketkiraan Endraar.
38 adharkup Pilaaththu: Saththiyamaavadhu Enna Endraan. Marupadiyum Avan Yoodhargalidaththil Veliye Vandhu: Naan Avanidaththil Oru Kutramum Kaanen.
39 paskaapandigaiyil Naan Ungalukku Oruvanai Vidudhalaipannugira Vazhakkamunde; Aagaiyaal Yoodharudaiya Raajaavai Naan Ungalukkaaga Vidudhalai Panna Ungalukku Manadhundaa Endraan.
40 appozhudhu: Avargalellaarum Ivanaiyalla, Parabaasai Vidudhalaipannavendum Endru Marupadiyum Saththamittaargal; Andhap Parabaasenbavan Kallanaayirundhaan.
